description:
Based on the question “Agile vs DevOps or Agile & DevOps?” Agile Connect Porto and DevOps Porto organized a discussion panel around the topics that unite (or divide) these communities. 
The panel will have 4 invited speakers and 2 moderators that will debate questions coming from the moderators and from the audience. Yes, you will be able to propose your on questions! 
Agenda:
• Welcome
• 1st round of debates
• Coffee/Networking break
• 2nd round of debates
• Conclusions
• Closing 
This event is FREE to attend, but you have to register yourself first. Hurry up because there are limited seats available.
name: Agile vs DevOps - Special Edition
